holidays.title: World Suicide Prevention Day
holidays.description: It's a growing problem and the numbers tell a shocking story.

holidays.title: Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day
holidays.description: On Carl Garner Federal Lands Cleanup Day, let’s find out how to get involved in our areas.

holidays.title: Drive Your Studebaker Day
holidays.description: Learn why Studebaker is regarded as the most exquisite car of the 20th century.

holidays.title: Farmers' Consumer Awareness Day
holidays.description: Farmers' Consumer Awareness Day is the most exciting way to learn where your food comes from.

holidays.title: Free Dentistry Day
holidays.description: Say goodbye to that toothache because dentists are available to help you for free today.

holidays.title: German Language Day
holidays.description: German is the language of poets Bertolt Brecht, Rainer Maria Rilke, and classic Weimar-era cinema.

holidays.title: Gibraltar National Day
holidays.description: It's Gibraltar National Day, and it's time to raise the flag proudly!

holidays.title: Harvest Moon Festival
holidays.description: Break out your forks and knives, it's time for some feasting and bonding, Korean style!

holidays.title: Mid-Autumn Festival
holidays.description: We know what you're thinking. Why does the Mid-Autumn Festival take place in late summer?

holidays.title: National Anti-Junk Light Day
holidays.description: Learn how to prevent your eyes from becoming damaged by different sources of junk light.

holidays.title: National TV Dinner Day
holidays.description: This day brings you all the fun of having a full meal without having to cook.

holidays.title: Pitru Paksha
holidays.description: Hindus are bound by their Dharma, or religion, to pray for the souls of their ancestors.

holidays.title: Swap Ideas Day
holidays.description: Do not forget your bag of ideas on Swap Ideas Day. It will be fun!

holidays.title: Top Up Day
holidays.description: Want to say “thank you” through a gesture rather than words? Give top-ups to struggling friends!

holidays.title: White Balloon Day
holidays.description: White Balloon Day encourages the collective effort of the community to make surroundings safe for children.

holidays.title: Big Daddy Kane’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn all about Big Daddy Kane, one of the most skilled MCs of the 80s.

holidays.title: Jack Gilinsky’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this talented pop singer with endless potential, the sky is the limit.

holidays.title: Mikey Way’s Birthday
holidays.description: The world is so much brighter and better with this musician’s talents.

holidays.title: PaintingRainbows’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber and Gamer is one post away from inalienable fame and success.

holidays.title: Stella Bennett’s Birthday
holidays.description: The one-half of “Stella & Blaise” is on a sure road to a successful career.
